quotes.text: I think the worst time to have a heart attack is during a game of charades.
quotes.author: Demitri Martin

quotes.text: When people ask me how many people work here, I say, about a third of them.
quotes.author: Lisa Kennedy Montgomery

quotes.text: Always and never are two words you should always remember never to use.
quotes.author: Wendell Johnson

quotes.text: I am not saying kill all the stupid people, just get rid of the warning labels and let the problem sort itself out.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Those who believe in telekinetics, raise my hand!
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.text: Always go to other people's funerals, otherwise they won't come to yours.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.text: Knowledge is knowing a tomato is a fruit; wisdom is not putting it in a fruit salad.
quotes.author: Miles Kington
